data.title: Winter NAMM 2015 – House of Worship: Spectrasonics unveils the all
data.meta_description: Check out the Winter NAMM 2015 – House of Worship: Spectrasonics unveils the all-new Omnisphere 2 synth software! page at Sweetwater — the world's leading music technology and instrument retailer!
data.text:
http://youtu.be/aSFeXJCdx9U

Eric Persing, from Spectrasonics, introduces us to Omnisphere 2. Featuring over 10,000 sounds, Omnisphere 2 is the ideal tool of choice to get great sounds and textures especially for worship. Now you can search for sounds by “mood”, and sounds pre-load in the background eliminating the lag when switching between patches. The new Soundmatch feature helps you quickly find similar sounds to ones you prefer. Use Live Mode to jump quickly between sounds or Stack Mode to split and layer sounds in real time.
